doDraw().details: The randomness is used to find a winner among all the tickets, which receive the rent of all properties stacked

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

stack(uint256[]).details: The ticket must have been entered at least one drawInterval ago to avoid abuse (being able to win without having contributed to the rent)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addTokens(address[],uint256[]).notice: Add a list of property tokens

doDraw().notice: Do the draw according to the randomness requested before

enter(address[],uint256[]).notice: Enter the lottery with a list of property tokens

exit(uint256[]).notice: Exit a list of tickets, the property token will be sent back to the user

findRandomNFT(uint256).notice: Find the winner according to the randomness

getTokensSupported().notice: Get the list of property tokens supported

prizeToBeWon().notice: Get the prize to be won in the next draw

requestDraw().notice: Request randomness to Witnet in order to do a draw

setInterests(address[],uint256[]).notice: Update the interests of a list of property tokens
